newsitem.title: ESTONIA: ESTONIA - UHIS APRIL PROFIT 15.685 MLN KROONS.
newsitem.headline: ESTONIA - UHIS APRIL PROFIT 15.685 MLN KROONS.

text.p: Uhispank had a net profit of 15.685 million kroons in April compared to 9.4 million kroons in March, the bank said on Thursday.
Uhispank had a net profit of 40.15 million kroons during the first four months.

Its assets were at 5.68 billion kroons which is 337 million kroons up from the last month. Without North-Estonian Bank in its March balance, with which Uhispank has merged, the rise from March to April was 1.51 billion kroons.
In April, Uhispank's assets exceeded Hoiupank's, the second largest bank in March, by 280 million kroons.
Uhispank's loan portfolio was 3.3 billion kroons and deposits 4.8 billion kroons in April.
